#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
const long long int MAXN=1e5+1;
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

int main()
{

    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int N;
    cin>>N;
    int bits=0;
    while(N)
    {
        bits+=N%2;
        N/=2;
    }
    cout<<bits<<endl;
    return 0;
}
